R

removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
Remove specified company from database
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class dao.CompanyDBDAO
 
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method gives instruction for CompanyDBDAO class to remove a company from the DB and deleting all coupons that attached to the company
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
Remove specified coupon from database
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class dao.CouponDBDAO
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
this method gives instruction for CouponDBDAO class to remove a coupon from the DB and conductor it to the removeCoupon method in CouponDBDAO class removes coupon from all customers that purchased it
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
Remove specified customer from database
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class dao.CustomerDBDAO
 
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method gives instruction for CustomerDBDAO class to remove a customer from the DB and remove all purchased coupons that attached to the customer
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class dao.ConnectionPool
this method is receiving a connection and set it back to the connections Set it also notify to the key object for the occasion that there is a thread that wait for connection.
run() - Method in class dao.DailyCouponExpirationTask
An Override method that exercises the runnable super class method.
